item.title: Government shutdown showcases Mike Johnson’s increasingly bold style

item.title: Trump’s focus on looks — from ‘central casting’ to ‘those lips’
item.description: The president’s longtime interest in physical appearance was frequently in evidence this week, including on his swing through the Middle East.
